title: India’s Jaishankar meets Sri Lankan Finance Minister
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Indian External Affairs Minister Dr. S. Jaishankar met with Sri Lankan Finance Minister Basil Rajapaksa for talks in Colombo on Monday (28), on the sidelines of the BIMSTEC summit
Dr. Jaishankara tweeted that he discussed the economic situation in Sri Lanka and India’s supportive response.
“We will continue to be guided by Neighbourhood First,” he tweeted.
